Class ExtendedProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>

          • com.verymuchme.appconfig.ExtendedProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>

    public class ExtendedProperties
extends Properties
    Wrao standard Properties object with a few convenience features

    2.0

    2.0

    Tracy Flynn

    • Method Detail

      • getBooleanProperty

        public boolean getBooleanProperty(String key)
        Get a property as a boolean. Returns the value true if the string argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "true". Returns false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        key - Property name
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getNullProperty

        public String getNullProperty(String key)
        Get a property as a null value. Returns the value null either if the property is undefined or if the property argument is not null and is equal, ignoring case, to the string "null". Returns the value otherwise.
        Parameters:
        key - Property name
        Returns:
        the value or null

      • getListProperty

        public ArrayList<String> getListProperty(String key)
        Get a property as an ArrayList. Uses ',' as the default separator.
        Parameters:
        key - Property name
        Returns:
        Array of string values, or null if no property present

      • getListProperty

        public ArrayList<String> getListProperty(String key,
                                String separator)
        Get a property as an ArrayList using the specified separator to split the string.
        Parameters:
        key - Property name
        separator - Separator
        Returns:
        Array of string values, or null if no property present
